channel.title: ransomware on MalScope
channel.description: Recent content in ransomware on MalScope

item.title: REvil Malware Analysis
item.author: byridianblack@malscope.com (ByridianBlack)
item.description: Summary This report is on the Ransomware as a Service REvil, detailing their techniques, any changes to previous samples they used and their obfuscation techniques.

item.title: Black Basta Ransomware Analysis
item.author: byridianblack@malscope.com (ByridianBlack)
item.description: Introduction Black Basta ransomware hit American Dental Association on the weekend of the week of 4/17, 2022.

item.title: LIKEAHORSE Malware Report. Uncovering its Secrets
item.author: byridianblack@malscope.com (ByridianBlack)
item.description: Introduction LIKEAHORSE is ransomware that garnered news in January, but while it was looked at, I have found no actual report on its features and abilities online.
